headquarters: New York, New York, United States
name: The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc.
summary: The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is a global financial institution that provides a wide range of financial services to corporations, financial institutions, governments, and individuals. Its principal activities include investment banking, securities trading and investments, investment management, and consumer and wealth management. The company operates through various divisions, including Global Banking & Markets and Asset & Wealth Management.
